actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 53(a) of the Airport and Airway Development Act of 1970 so as to include snowmobiles within the $25 ceiling imposed on overtime charges for certain services in connection with the arrival in or departure from the United States of any private aircraft or private vessel.

summary.text: Includes snowmobiles within the $25 ceiling imposed, under the Airport and Airway Development Act, on overtime charges for services in connection with the arrival in or departure from the United States of any private aircraft or private vessel. (Amends 49 U.S.C. 1741(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 53(a) of the Airport and Airway Development Act of 1970 so as to include snowmobiles within the $25 ceiling imposed on overtime charges for certain services in connection with the arrival in or departure from the United States of any private aircraft or private vessel.
